attributes.long-description:
Stay sharp in this blisteringly fast-paced modern day shooter. Protect your team as you move from cover to cover, eliminating threads as they appear! Fight on foot or in a variety of vehicles including tanks, helicopters, and APCs. Utilize weapons ranging from handguns to mounted cannons and grenades to stay alive, keep fighting, and complete your mission. Get up close and personal with guns and grenades. Rain down fire from a helicopter gunship, or dominate with a tank. No matter the weapon, there is no way but forward, and no choice but victory. 20 plus levels, urban combat, mountain warfare, air assault, and more. Online leaderboard to compare scores, 60 plus Trophies and awards. Single player or cooperative mode for up to 4 players.

1-4 players
SIXAXIS Motion Sensitive
DUALSHOCK®3
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

The BLACKHAWK! and S.T.R.I.K.E. marks are trademarks of Alliant Techsystems, Inc and are used under license. WILEY X, the WILEY X Eyewear Logo, WX, the WX Eyewear logo, the WX Wiley X logo and product names are trademarks or registered trademarks (marca registrada) of Wiley X, Inc., in the U.S. and other countries. All other names and marks are property of their respective owners. Logos © 2007 – 2009 Wiley X, Inc. All rights reserved. © 2011 Mastiff, LLC. All rights reserved. Developed by Teyon. The ratings icon is a registered trademark of the Entertainment Software Association. All other trademarks and trade names are properties of their respective owners. PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
attributes.name: Heavy Fire: Afghanistan
